metadata.title: CVE-2016-2316 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: chan_sip in Asterisk Open Source 1.8.x, 11.x before 11.21.1, 12.x, and 13.xbefore 13.7.1 and Certified Asterisk 1.8.28, 11.6 before 11.6-cert12, and13.1 before 13.1-cert3, when the timert1 sip.conf configuration is set to avalue greater than 1245, allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (file descriptor consumption) via vectors related to largeretransmit timeout values.

criterions.comment: asterisk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
